variation_responses.I'm curious about the capital city of Fr: The capital city of France is Paris. It is located in the northern-central part of the country and is one of the most famous cities in the world. Paris is known for its iconic landmarks such as the Eiffel Tower, Louvre Museum, Notre-Dame Cathedral, and Champs-Élysées. It is also a cultural hub with a rich history, vibrant arts scene, fashion, and cuisine.
